entries.meaning: (of stockings) Without runs, or not susceptible to runs.
examples: Some of them will be mini-distresses: you get into a traffic jam that causes a minor delay; your garbage disposal breaks down and you have to call a repairman; you discover your daughter has absconded with your last pair of runless hose  […]

entries.meaning: (sports) Without runs scored (in cricket, baseball, etc.).
